title: Need Help With Picking A Font For My TV Show.
content:
I just edited a brand new trailer for a tv show I'm working on but now I need a font that compliments the title of the show, VIP Latino. I'm not really a typophile so a suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ZvouSfgIVU](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720020517/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ZvouSfgIVU "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ZvouSfgIVU")
author: jwilliam85
